_comment: Logistic calibration parameters: calibrated = 1 / (1 + exp(-a * (raw - 0.5) + b))
_changelog: v1.1: Reduced a from 5.0 to 3.0 for smoother probability transitions
v1.2: Added documentation and validation ranges
_description: Controls how raw confidence scores are transformed into calibrated probabilities. Higher 'a' values create sharper transitions (more aggressive), lower values create smoother transitions (more conservative). The value b shifts the midpoint.
